name: The LAYA Beach Bag
description:
Large Beach Bag with inside pockets.

Embroided "ne soyez pas timide" meaning Don't be shy.

Waterproof.

100% Polyester.
short_description: Large Beach Bag with inside pockets. Embroided “ne soyez pas timide” meaning Don’t be shy. Waterproof. 100% Polyester.

name: Modern Love Top
description:
Underwire bikini top bra with adjustable straps and a back tie.

Made in Mauritius of Spanish fabric.

Handwash cold, dry flat. Fabric contains SPF 50.

Fully lined, seamless design.

80% polyamide, 20% elastane.
short_description: Underwire bikini top bra with adjustable straps and a back tie. Moderate support. Flattering design.
